sqlMap.sql:
SELECT JEN_ID , JEN_NM , JEN_USR_ID , JEN_USR_TOK , JEN_URL , REPLACE (JEN_DESC ,'
' , '    ' ) AS JEN_DESC , USE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', USE_CD, '1') as USE_NM , DEL_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP FROM JEN1000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND DEL_CD ='02' AND UPPER( JEN_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( JEN_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND USE_CD = #searchCd#

SELECT A.JEN_ID , B.JEN_NM , B.JEN_USR_ID , B.JEN_USR_TOK , B.JEN_URL , A.JOB_ID , NVL(A.JOB_RESTORE_ID,'-') AS JOB_RESTORE_ID , A.JOB_TOK , A.JOB_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00002', A.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM , A.JOB_DESC , A.USE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM JEN1100 A LEFT JOIN JEN1000 B ON(A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.DEL_CD = '02'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT Z.* FROM JEN1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# )
AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId#
AND A.USE_CD = #useCd#
AND UPPER( JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( JOB_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND USE_CD = #searchCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (
) A )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (
) A )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.JEN_ID = #jenId#

SELECT * FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_JEN_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_JEN_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'JEN' || TO_CHAR((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_JEN_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(JEN_ID) AS NEW_JEN_ID FROM JEN1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND JEN_ID LIKE 'JEN' || TO_CHAR((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO JEN1000 ( JEN_ID , JEN_NM , JEN_USR_ID , JEN_USR_TOK , JEN_URL , JEN_DESC , USE_CD , DEL_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP , LIC_GRP_ID ) VALUES ( #newJenId#, #jenNm#, #jenUsrId#, #jenUsrTok#, #jenUrl#, #jenDesc#, #useCd#, '02', (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp#, #licGrpId# )

INSERT INTO JEN1100 ( JEN_ID , JOB_ID , JOB_RESTORE_ID , JOB_TOK , JOB_TYPE_CD , JOB_DESC , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP , LIC_GRP_ID ) VALUES ( #jenId#, #jobId#, #jobRestoreId#, #jobTok#, #jobTypeCd#, #jobDesc#, #useCd#, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp#, #licGrpId# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE JEN1000 SET
JEN_ID = #jenId# , JEN_NM = #jenNm# , JEN_USR_ID = #jenUsrId# , JEN_USR_TOK = #jenUsrTok# , JEN_URL = #jenUrl# , JEN_DESC = #jenDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId#

UPDATE JEN1100 SET JEN_ID = #jenId# , JOB_ID = #jobId# , JOB_RESTORE_ID = #jobRestoreId# , JOB_TOK = #jobTok# , JOB_TYPE_CD = #jobTypeCd# , JOB_DESC = #jobDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
UPDATE JEN1000 SET DEL_CD = #delCd# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM JEN1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM JEN1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM JEN1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT B.JEN_USR_ID ,B.JEN_USR_TOK ,B.JEN_NM ,B.JEN_URL ,B.JEN_ID ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JEN1300 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = C.JOB_ID AND C.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# ) AS AUTH_CNT FROM JEN1100 B , ( SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , JEN_ID , JOB_ID , FROM JEN1200 WHERE PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND B.USE_CD ='01'
AND B.JEN_NM = #jobname#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JEN1200 A ( A.PRJ_ID, A.JEN_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_ID ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #jenId#, #authGrpId# ,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM JEN1200 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.JEN_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_ID ,B.AUTH_GRP_NM ,B.AUTH_GRP_DESC ,B.CREATE_DT ,B.USE_CD ,B.USR_TYP ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', B.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM FROM JEN1200 A, ADM1100 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY B.ORD
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AUTH_GRP_CNT FROM JEN1200 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
